Hero.text1: Our kitchen, CHEF ELIAN MULLER AND HIS TEAM —THEY TRANSFORM DINING INTO ART. WITH TAILORED MENUS, PRIVATE DINING, EVENTS BIG OR SMALL AND OUR CAPTIVATING CHEF'S TABLE.OUR HIGH-END KITCHEN CRAFTS EXPERIENCES TO SAVOUR. OPEN TO MEMBERS AND THEIR GUESTS, OUR RESTAURANT SERVES DELECTABLE BREAKFAST AND LUNCH FROM MONDAY TO FRIDAY & WE HAVE SOMETHING NEW FOR YOU - TAKE AWAY DINNERS, IF YOU DON'T HAVE TIME TO DO IT YOURSELF AND LOVE TO BE SPOILED BY OUR CHEFS. EVEN WHEN YOU'RE HOME.
